base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with two doors.
part_description: The cabinet has two rectangular doors, each with a handle, arranged side by side. The doors are paneled and occupy the front of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on opposite sides, allowing them to open outward from the center. The handles facilitate easy opening and closing, while the paneled design adds structural rigidity and visual interest.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a countertop. It is designed to store items inside, with the doors providing access. Handles allow users to open the cabinet, and its neutral color fits various interior designs.
